Summary: Silver ball on intercept with B-52 disappears then
divs: Sighting Details1.) Driving south 15 Nevada out of Las Vegas, just past Whiskey Petes2.)Unusual caravan of high level aircraft in pairs traveling west of highwayfrom horizon to horizon.3.) UFO silver ball, no condensation trail, thought nota plane cant glide with no wings.4.) I became interested and advised thedriver to pull over, took out tripod and camera, set zoom. Afterwardsreturned to vehicle. Reaction was interest26 curiosity.5.) Object paralelled B-52 approx 7 wingspans below and began tointercept closing toward plane. It then disappeared. Within a second itreappeared above and behind the aircraft approx the same distance away asoriginal sighting. At this point it curved down, again toward the plane had at first no con trail then like a backwards comma it developed a con trail whispy then as thick as the combined trail of the B52. It then fell inbehind, and disappeared.6) See above
